reviewText: This is an awesome 2 disc collection, featuring 9 Puppet Master movies out of the 11(only missing Puppet Master: Axis of Evil and Puppet Master Vs. Demonic Toys). The original Puppet Master is the only one of this collection to be restored to the 16:9 aspect ratio, the other 8 being the old 4:3 ratio we all remember from the 90's direct to video set. That's actually my only real complaint, that they couldn't restore the other films to the 16:9 ratio for this collection, and that there were absolutely no special features like deleted scenes, commentaries, special intro for the set, trailers, or anything.

reviewText: The PPM series is of course great.What's not so great is the transfer of PPM II, towards the end of the movie, the video starts beatingand flashing.Quite annoying. Very poor transfer.Contacted Echo Bridge and got no response.Will be looking to replace this with another distributors version very soon.

reviewText: The Puppetmaster Collection gather nine films in an inexpensive DVD package. Sprinlkled through are some familiar Hollywood names. Puppetmaster top-billed Paul Le Mat who came to my notice in American Graffiti. Great suppoert is provided by Barbara Crampton, who'll I will never forget as the wild Leanna Love on The Youg And The Restless. Puppetmaster 2 has the wonderful Nita Talbot as a wacky medium. Puppetmaster 5 has the lovely Diane McBain as an attorney. Horroe fans may like these best, I also enjoyed very much seeing these actors mentioned.

reviewText: If you are a fan of the Puppet Master series or just a fan of classic horror, you can't lose.  I only saw 2 of the Puppet Master movies... didn't even know there was 9... and I had a blast watching them.  Great collection.  Just wish they re-release these in wide screen.  I haven't been able to find any releases in the widescreen format.  But besides that, I loved this set.

reviewText: My favorite puppet master movie is the 4th one but it was nice to see this entire collection. This would be a great gift for anyone who likes horror movies especially those involving evil toys. Or if you yourself are a horror movie buff and you have not seen this set, it is definitely worth the $$$
